amendment.description: Amendment increases Department of Defense funding for "Procurement, Defense-Wide" by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendemt to reduce funding for "Disaster Relief" under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act by $2 million and to increase funding for "Procurement, Defense-Wide" of the Air Force by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Jindal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jindal amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
